sentences.en: After 18 days of stonewalling, he at last came out and faced the issue.
sentences.cn: 拖了18天后，他终于肯出来面对该问题了。

sentences.en: But both of them are stonewalling - they refuse to answer any questions at all.
sentences.cn: 但是,这两人都拒绝回答任何问题,企图蒙混过去.

sentences.en: Gates and company were defiant, to the point of stonewalling regulators and refusing to take the charges seriously.
sentences.cn: 盖茨和公司目中无人，到了阻碍监管机构并且拒绝认真对待指控的地步。

sentences.en: North Vietnamese stonewalling doomed Cambodia, however, to prolonged agony.
sentences.cn: 然而北越人的拖延战术却使柬埔寨惨遭长期的磨难.

sentences.en: The witnesses ate stonewalling our investigation.
sentences.cn: 证人们阻碍着我们的调查.

sentences.en: Through the dinner, I was stonewalling.
sentences.cn: 吃饭的过程中, 我始终很谨慎.

words.tran_cn: 妨碍；阻碍；小心翼翼地打球
妨碍；阻碍；小心翼翼地打球

trans.tran_cn: 慎打，阻碍或妨碍议程，石墙
（用冗长发言或拒绝回答问题等）拖延[阻碍]议事，设置障碍( stonewall的现在分词 )，拒绝执行命令，拒绝服从命令，（板球中）打守势球，小心地打慢球
